content.raw: Another question about support... I remember at some point we mentioned the haptix-support@osrfoundation.org mailing list for Haptix performers. Should we refer teams to this mailing list instead of Gazebo answers, since questions relevant to Haptix performers are probably of little interest to Gazebo users, and vice versa?
